conclusion: Analyze paths of liquids from A, B, and C through baffles.
Cyan liquid flows down from A and encounters the light blue baffle.
Cyan liquid splits and flows along the baffle to the left, reaching the white baffle.
Cyan liquid continues downward, flowing into container E.
Green liquid flows down from B and encounters the yellow baffle.
Green liquid flows along the yellow baffle to the right, then down along the red baffle.
Green liquid splits and flows towards container F and container G, mostly into container F.
Pink liquid flows down from C and encounters the yellow baffle.
Pink liquid flows along the yellow baffle to the right, then down along the red baffle.
Pink liquid splits and flows towards container F and container G, mostly into container G.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid from B flows into container F.
Liquid from C flows into container G.
